name: Burn to depth
description:
Hi everyone ! This is my first submission to the Mini Jam, the theme was Depths, and the limitation was "Health is a tool".

Yes, there is no sound, this is unbalanced and not very beautifull.. This is clearly a prototype more than a game, I was too much ambitious for a made alone game in 3 days...

Thank you for playing, I hope you got at leaste a little of fun !
